  • Uses of Piece in chess

    Methods in chess that return Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Piece Square.getPiece()
    Getter method to get the piece on the current square.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Square.setPiece​(Piece piece)
    Setter method to change the current piece on the square.
    Constructors in chess with parameters of type Piece
    Constructor Description
    Square​(int row, int col, Piece piece)
    Constructor to initialize the current square.
